description: This is a market on who Donald Trump will nominate for the position of Secretary of Veterans Affairs.

markets.description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Trump nominates Person A for Secretary of Veterans Affairs by June 30, 2025, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

This market may be updated in the future to replace Person A with one of the potential nominees.

This market will resolve based on Trump's first nomination for Secretary of Veterans Affairs - if Trump nominates another person first to be Secretary of Veterans Affairs this market will immediately resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the US government, however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.
markets.question: Will Trump nominate Person A for Secretary of Veterans Affairs?
